FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_hackathon.summary: Recent activities in the scilab_case_study_hackathon repository include multiple push events to update content, add new logos, and modify existing files. A pull request was also merged to add new logos. Additionally, various updates were made to different pages such as Home, problem-statement, evaluation, and resources.

FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: The Common-Interface-Project repository has seen significant activity with push events to simplify code, update ExplicitLink, and modify xsl files for geometry. Multiple pull requests were also merged, focusing on geometry and xmlparser file updates, showcasing ongoing development and refinement of the project.

FOSSEE/fossee-banners.summary: Recently, the fossee-banners repository experienced updates with the addition of a new banner for the scilab hackathon and a subsequent update to the banner link. These changes were facilitated through push events and merge of a pull request, indicating active management of banner content.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: The certificate-generator repository had a notable update with a push event adding Arduino Workshop Certificates, demonstrating the repository's ongoing role in generating certificates for various workshops and events.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_portal.summary: In the scilab_case_study_portal repository, a recent push event added a description under the project title, directly from GitHub, indicating minor but significant updates to the portal's content for better clarity and user experience.
